ToxicDart.name: Toxic Dart
ToxicDart.description: Projectile that deals damage and applies poison over time. Shoots closest unpoisoned enemy.

ShadowStep.name: Shadow Step
ShadowStep.description: Teleport behind furthest enemy and deal 300% damage
ShadowStep.level3: 600% and it explodes for additional 150% AoE Damage

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: Cleaves nearby enemies and applies bleed

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back

FieryCharge.name: Fiery Charge
FieryCharge.description: Charges in the direction of closest enemy. Sets all enemies in path on fire.

VenomFang.name: Venom Fang
VenomFang.description: Strike 3 close enemies. Apply poison and bleed.
VenomFang.level1: 10 damage. 4 damage/s bleed for 4s. 2 damage/s poison for 10s
VenomFang.level2: 25 damage. 10 damage/s bleed for 4s. 5 damage/s poison for 10s.
VenomFang.level3: 45 damage. 18 damage/s bleed for 4s. 12 damage/s poison for 10s.
